constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 109 (Wednesday, June 23, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. WALORSKI:
H.R. 4109.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Clause 1 of section 8 of article I of the Constitution, to
``provide for the common defense and general welfare of the
United States.''
[Page H3083]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

title: Protections for Socially Good Activities Act
